description: This view contains all top line metrics data

schema.name: date
schema.description: Date partition

schema.name: period_start
schema.description: Start of period

schema.name: period_end
schema.description: End of period

schema.name: sam_number
schema.description: SAM number for set of orgs

schema.name: account_size_segment
schema.description: Account size segment of grouping

schema.name: account_arr_segment
schema.description: Account ARR segment of grouping

schema.name: account_billing_country
schema.description: Billing country of the account

schema.name: account_industry
schema.description: Account industry of grouping

schema.name: industry_vertical
schema.description: Industry vertical of grouping

schema.name: is_paid_safety_customer
schema.description: Whether the SAM has Safety licenses or not

schema.name: is_paid_telematics_customer
schema.description: Whether the SAM has Telematics licenses or not

schema.name: is_paid_stce_customer
schema.description: Whether the SAM has STCE licenses or not

schema.name: account_csm_email
schema.description: CSM email of the account

schema.name: account_name
schema.description: Name of the account

schema.name: account_id
schema.description: ID of the account

schema.name: trips
schema.description: Total number of trips over the period

schema.name: miles
schema.description: Total number of miles driver over the period

schema.name: active_drivers
schema.description: Total number of drivers on a trip over the period

schema.name: active_cloud_dashboard_users
schema.description: Total number of active cloud dashboard users over the period

schema.name: active_driver_app_users
schema.description: Total number of active driver app users over the period

schema.name: marketplace_integrations
schema.description: Total number of active marketplace integrations

schema.name: api_requests
schema.description: Total number of API requests made in the period

schema.name: device_licenses_ag
schema.description: Total number of AG device licenses

schema.name: device_licenses_vg
schema.description: Total number of VG device licenses

schema.name: device_licenses_cm
schema.description: Total number of CM device licenses

schema.name: device_licenses_at
schema.description: Total number of AT device licenses

schema.name: device_licenses_sg
schema.description: Total number of SG device licenses

schema.name: active_devices_ag
schema.description: Total number of AG active devices

schema.name: active_devices_vg
schema.description: Total number of VG active devices

schema.name: active_devices_cm
schema.description: Total number of CM active devices

schema.name: active_devices_at
schema.description: Total number of AT active devices

schema.name: active_devices_sg
schema.description: Total number of SG active devices

schema.name: total_licenses
schema.description: Total number of active licenses

schema.name: total_licenses_assigned
schema.description: Total number of active assigned licenses

schema.name: total_licenses_software
schema.description: Total number of active software licenses

schema.name: total_licenses_assigned_software
schema.description: Total number of active assigned software licenses

schema.name: total_licenses_hardware
schema.description: Total number of active hardware licenses

schema.name: total_licenses_assigned_hardware
schema.description: Total number of active assigned hardware licenses
